author: wschwab
content: it seemed to us at the time that it was some strange behavior in Foundry/Anvil

author: zerosnacks
content: Hi <@601063305070772244> you would mind opening a ticket in Foundry with additional details? Thanks!

author: wschwab
content: lemme see what I can do - it wasn't me, I was asking for someone else, the tl;dr was that `extcodesize` was returning nonzero even after delegation was reset to the zero addr iirc, but I'll try to look into it

author: zerosnacks
content: Thanks, we are aware of an issue in regard to 7702 nonce management and have a fix ready: https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry/issues/10461 but this seems unrelated
